articles.title: Breaking: Samsung has reportedly cancelled the Galaxy S26 Edge, here's why - Android Authority
articles.description: A new report suggests Samsung has canceled the Galaxy S26 Edge due to poor sales of its predecessor, the Galaxy S25 Edge.

articles.title: Apple’s Head of ChatGPT-Like AI Search Effort to Leave for Meta - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Apple Inc. executive leading an effort to develop AI-driven web search is stepping down, marking the latest in a string of high-profile exits from the company’s artificial intelligence division.

articles.title: Destiny 2 Has Already Reversed a Ton of Edge of Fate Changes, Here’s Everything That’s Been Rolled Back (and What’s Coming in Renegades) - The Game Post
articles.description: After three months, Bungie’s already walked back a ton of Edge of Fate changes in Destiny 2, and with Renegades launching soon, even more changes are on the way.
